name: Logpoint
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Logpoint
description:
Logpoint

A kind of Google::Cloud::Debugger::Breakpoint that can be evaluated to generate a formatted log string, which later can be submitted to Stackdriver Logging service

methods.name: evaluate
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger

params.name: call_stack_bindings
params.description:
An array of Ruby Binding
objects, from the call stack that leads to the triggering of the
breakpoints.

returns.description: True if evaluated successfully; false otherwise.
